## Remarks

Encodes the child octant by the sign of (<!-- -->(x, y, z)<!-- -->)<!-- -->: - `P` for positive, `N` for negative. - Example: `PPN` means (<!-- -->+x, +y, -z<!-- -->)<!-- -->.
